message.body: I'm fucking great! Caffeinated. Selling copies of a book i wrote 5 yrs ago. Just had coffee with a white house press correspondant who wants me to produce his next cd. Been writing music. Have a gig for a special fx company coming up in the next few weeks
What are you doing for new year's?
I've a bunch of parties think am Just choosing one. It's a date, have been seeing someone. What are u up to?

Seeing someone is good. ;-)
I dunno yet. Mixed feelings about the whole thing. Might tag along w/ friends to some party. Might record music - since i'll have the place to myself. Undecided.
Sometime after this new year's thing, i'd still like to meet and hang. You're welcome to bring your boy if you wanna. Coffee loves company. ;-)
Me too! Of course and indeed. Just us i think. Need to catch up!
Cool. I look forward to it. ;-)
